name: PASSERIFORMES // METAZOA
description:
## SOUND ON ##

The songbirds and passerines are the largest order of birds and they are beautiful singers.

Metazoa is a fantastic kingdom without hierarchy where all beings are equally important. Anura, primates, cetacea, passeriformes and hexapoda sing songs mixing organic and electronic sounds.

The sounds of animals in the Atlantic Forest and the southeastern shore of Brazil are made into songs sung by the creatures themselves and each of the five pieces represents a specific group within the animal kingdom.

Gabriel Politzer, from Rio de Janeiro, sound artist, musician and biologist. Interest in the maintenance of integrity, preservation and biological quality of the environment.

Track: 4 of 5
Genres: electronic, bioacustic
Release Date: Dec 12, 2020
